text: @realDonaldTrump There is NO WINNING W/ OVER 22,000 DEATHS & OVER 555,000 COVID-19 CASES.  NOBODY KNOWS WHEN OR WHERE IT WILL END. WE NEED PROPER TESTING BEFORE YOU CAN EVER THINK OF OPENING UP FOR BUSINESS. TESTING IS FAR TOO UNAVAILABLE & UNRELIABLE. GET IT DONE OR WE WILL NEVER GO BACK TO WORK

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
